data.title: Finals 2
data.meta_description: Rick Ross revisits his "Finals" track and brings along Wale, Gunplay, Rockie Fresh, Tracy T, Fat Trel, and French Monatana.
data.text:
With a rematch of last year’s NBA Finals kicking off tonight, Rick Ross felt it was necessary to revisit a classic MMG song of theirs and re-“heat” it up.

Before the 2011 NBA Finals, Rozay celebrated his hometown Miami Heat making the championship by releasing the track “Finals” featuring Meek Mill and Gunplay.

Fast forward three years, and Rozay is back with the D. Rich-produced street banger “Finals 2”, only this time he substitutes Meek Mill for Wale, Gunplay, Rockie Fresh, Fat Trel, Tracy T, and French Montana.

Give the encore a listen below, and let us know who you think had the hardest verse?

Quotable Lyrics:

Rich niggas don't test drive

And double M, that be the best high

I let her count the cake up in my stash spot

Put all her naked photos in my laptop

We got a bond that we could never break

She wash her hair with Bel Air, that pussy sweet as cake
